title: Factors associated with positive user experience with primary healthcare providers in Mexico: a multilevel modelling approach using national cross-sectional data
abstract: Objective This study aimed to investigate factors associated with patient experience with primary care in a large public health system in Mexico and determine the amount of variability in experience attributable to facilitylevel and state-level factors
citation: Holt, K., Doubova, S.V., Lee, D., Cuevas, R.P., Leslie, H.H. (2020). “Factors associated with positive user experience with primary healthcare providers in Mexico: a multilevel modelling approach using national cross-sectional data”. BMJ Open. 10(1), doi: 10.1136/bmjopen-2019-029818.
